title: No link for league client beta download
body: I wanted to download the league client beta but I cant seem to find the link in my launcher, and I either missed or didnt get the popup to download it when I launched league. can someone point out where the link is in the launcher for me?

replies.body:
The Beta hasn't been rolled out yet, but it's coming soon. If you were looking for the Alpha Client instead, you can find the installer [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/download).

Let me know if this helped.
